name: Dice Drop (hulgarth)
description:
Description

Dice drop is a puzzle game where you try to get the dice to the goal by using placeable objects.

How To Play

-Left click to place objects
-Mouse wheel up and down to rotate straight pieces
-Press space to drop dice
-Press ESC or TAB for menu

Jam Info

Team members:  Just me Ryan Saunders
Assets:  All assets were made during the jam with the exception of the background music and 2 particle effects.

If you remotely enjoyed this game I made in 48 hours, please consider checking out what I can do with 2+ years of hard work.  My latest game on steam "Game Dev Masters" is fantastic, and I would love for you to check it out.  There is a free demo you can try or wish list the game to support.  Thank you and have fun.
